title: AI policy choices in coming years will shape economic growth , global power : Romesh Wadhwani
description: Washington, Jan 31 (IANS) Artificial intelligence is advancing so rapidly that national policy choices made in the next few years will determine economic growth, geopolitical power, and social stability, technology entrepreneur Romesh Wadhwani said.

Washington, Jan 31 (IANS) Artificial intelligence is advancing so rapidly that national policy choices made in the next few years will determine economic growth, geopolitical power, and social stability, technology entrepreneur Romesh Wadhwani said.

Delivering the keynote address at a major CSIS conference ahead of India’s upcoming AI Impact Summit, Wadhwani said AI is entering a new phase defined by autonomous “AI agents”
